meta.name: viewport

span.span: WELCOME TO TWO ROCK UNION SCHOOL DISTRICT
Collaborating with Coast Guard and local families
to prepare students for active participation

div.p: Two Rock School offers an individualized educational program in a safe, welcoming, and community-focused environment. We have an integrated STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Math) instructional program alongside strong social-emotional support systems, which are funded in part through DoDEA grants. Located in a beautiful valley surrounded by farmland and adjacent to the Two Rock Coast Guard Training Center, our campus is one of a kind.

In addition to rigorous education in core subjects, students benefit from 1:1 technology devices and state of the art media systems. Students learn life skills through the use of the Toolbox Project while being supported with strong counselling and intervention programs. Our school garden, STEAM lab, library, art, and music programs round out an exceptional place to learn. After-school programs and enrichments, including sports for all 4th-6th grade students, offer students the opportunity to participate in activities outside of the school day. Our small school environment and full educational curriculum allow all students to be successful and to nurture their individual interests.

span.span: North Bay County Schools Plan for Distance Learning Through the Remainder

p.span: The governor of California has announced the suspension of in-person instruction for the remainder of the school year. We will continue to provide distance learning and follow our calendar, but we are sad that we won't get to see our students.

span.span: El gobernador de California anunció la suspensión de la instrucción en persona por el resto del año escolar. Seguiremos ofreciendo enseñanza a distancia y siguiendo nuestro calendario, pero estamos tristes de no poder ver a nuestros estudiantes.

p.span: You can reach our District Secretary, Casey Pavao, at cpavao@trusd.org and our Bilingual Secretary, Mariela Lozano, at mlozano@trusd.org. You can also reach the Superintendent-Principal, Betha MacClain, at bmacclain@trusd.org

span.span: Puede comunicarse con nuestra Secretaria de Distrito, Casey Pavao, en cpavao@trusd.org y con nuestra Secretaria Bilingüe, Mariela Lozano, en mlozano@trusd.org. También puede comunicarse con la Superintendente-Directora, Betha MacClain, en bmacclain@trusd.org

p.span: Please see below for Covid 19 School Closure Information.
Consulte a continuación la información de cierre de la escuela Covid 19.

span.span: Two Rock Union School District is excited to announce that we are now a certified childcare provider with the U.S. Coast Guard. This means Coast Guard families may be eligible to have their daycare fees paid for by the USCG. Click here to find out more information. ​ ​

Two Rock Elementary School will follow Sonoma County guidelines for Shelter In Place through the remainder of the school year, until June 2020. Staff will only be on campus intermittently through that date, if not longer, depending on how the situation unfolds. The office will not be open, but messages will be checked periodically. See below for additional contact information and expect to hear from school staff on or before March 30 regarding student remote learning.

La escuela primaria Two Rock seguirá los lineamientos del condado de Sonoma para Shelter In Place durante el resto del año escolar, hasta junio de 2020. El personal sólo estará en el campus de forma intermitente hasta esa fecha, si no más, dependiendo de cómo se desarrolle la situación. La oficina no estará abierta, pero los mensajes serán revisados periódicamente. Vea a continuación la información de contacto adicional y espere escuchar al personal de la escuela en o antes del 30 de marzo con respecto al aprendizaje a distancia de los estudiantes.
Update: Free Meals During School Closure

Petaluma City Schools will be providing food service to Two Rock students in the form of grab-and-go meals beginning on Monday, March 23rd. Meals can be picked up at McDowell Elementary and Petaluma Junior High School. Please note that students must be present. This is available to all students and any siblings under 18. You do not need to be eligible for free and reduced lunch. This service will be provided until school facilities re-open.

span.br:
Mondays from 9:00 AM-11:00 AM (3 meals)
Thursdays from 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM (2 meals)

br.br: Pickup location is in front of the school, in the bus drop-off area

span.br: Pickup location is off McGregor in front of the multi, in the bus drop-off area

span.span: Las escuelas de la ciudad de Petaluma proporcionarán servicio de alimentos a los estudiantes de Two Rock en forma de comidas para llevar a partir del lunes 23 de marzo. Las comidas se pueden recoger en McDowell Elementary y Petaluma Junior High School. Tenga en cuenta que los estudiantes deben estar presentes. Esto está disponible para todos los estudiantes y cualquier hermano menor de 18 años. No es necesario ser elegible para almuerzo gratis oa precio reducido. Este servicio se proporcionará hasta que las instalaciones escolares vuelvan a abrir.

span.br:
Lunes de 9:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. (3 comidas)
Jueves de 9:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. (2 comidas)

Petaluma Junior High:
El lugar de recogida está enfrente de la escuela, en el área de entrega del autobús.

span.span:
Escuela primaria McDowell:
La ubicación de recogida está fuera de McGregor frente al multi, en el área de entrega del autobús
Para la versión en español, por favor vea abajo.

During the COVID-19 outbreak, Sonic is offering three months of free internet access and unlimited nationwide home telephone service to households with K-12, college students, or senior citizens 60 or older.

Based on location, service is available through our fiber-optic network, with symmetric speeds of up to 1Gbps (1000Mbps/1000Mbps download, and upload) or our copper network, with speeds up to 50Mbps. There are no data caps, so it is ideal for students who are streaming distance learning during the coronavirus crisis.
For financial assistance for current customers, please contact billing@sonic.net.

As our country continues to manage the COVID-19 emergency, Comcast is taking immediate steps to help connect low-income families to the Internet at home. New Internet Essentials customers will receive two free months of Internet service, which is available to all qualified low-income households for $9.95/month plus tax. Apply by April 30, 2020. https://apply.internetessentials.com/

Xfinity WiFi hotspots across the country will be available to anyone who needs them for free – including non-Xfinity Internet subscribers. For a map of Xfinity WiFi hotspots, visit www.xfinity.com/wifi. Once at a hotspot, consumers should select the “xfinitywifi” network name in the list of available hotspots and then launch a browser.
Acceso gratuito a Internet - marzo de 2020

Durante el brote de COVID-19, Sonic ofrece tres meses de acceso gratuito a Internet y servicio telefónico doméstico ilimitado en todo el país a los hogares con K-12, estudiantes universitarios o personas mayores de 60 años.

Según la ubicación, el servicio está disponible a través de nuestra red de fibra óptica, con velocidades simétricas de hasta 1Gbps (1000Mbps/1000Mbps de descarga y subida) o nuestra red de cobre, con velocidades de hasta 50Mbps. No hay topes de datos, por lo que es ideal para los estudiantes que están transmitiendo educación a distancia durante la crisis del coronavirus.
Para asistencia financiera para clientes actuales, por favor contacte con billing@sonic.net.

Mientras nuestro país continúa gestionando la emergencia de COVID-19, Comcast está tomando medidas inmediatas para ayudar a conectar a las familias de bajos ingresos a Internet en casa. Los nuevos clientes de Internet Essentials recibirán dos meses gratis de servicio de Internet, el cual está disponible para todos los hogares de bajos ingresos que califiquen por $9.95/mes más impuestos. Aplique antes del 30 de abril de 2020. https://apply.internetessentials.com/

Los puntos de acceso WiFi de Xfinity en todo el país estarán a disposición de todos los que los necesiten de forma gratuita, incluidos los suscriptores de Internet que no sean de Xfinity. Para ver un mapa de los puntos de acceso a la red WiFi de Xfinity, visite www.xfinity.com/wifi. Una vez en un punto de acceso, los consumidores deben seleccionar el nombre de la red "xfinitywifi" en la lista de puntos de acceso disponibles y luego iniciar un navegador.

div.p: The Sonoma County Office of Education has created a Coronavirus FAQ web page available in English and Spanish. This page will be updated regularly.

p.span: Click HERE to view the Sonoma County Office Of Education (SCOE) Infectious Disease Response Plan regarding the Coronavirus (COVID_19).

span.span: Accessibility Notice: TRUSD is committed to ensuring that its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you experience difficulty accessing any content on TRUSD's website, please contact Casey Pavao (cpavao@trusd.org) or 707-762-6617 to request the information in an alternative format, or to provide feedback on how TRUSD can improve its website accessibility.
